definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Rhizomes consistently short necked, culms always forming a single clump.
sentences.chinese: 一贯的根状茎短颈，秆总是形成一片单个的丛。

sentences.english: Most wheat crops are susceptible to stem rust.
sentences.chinese: 大多数小麦品种都可以感染秆锈病。

sentences.english: Can you tell me rate for a double room, please?
sentences.chinese: 请哥诉我一戒双人房的秆用可以吗？

sentences.english: Potassium content in shooting is the greatest and in root and stem (more than two years old) the lowest;
sentences.chinese: 笋是含钾量最高的器官，地下茎和二年以上的秆最低。

sentences.english: Stem rust produces reddish brown reddish-brown spots on the stems of infected plants.
sentences.chinese: 秆锈在感染的作物的茎上有微红黄色的斑点。

sentences.english: The invention provides a method for making pictures with corn or sorghum stalks.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供了一种用玉米秸秆和秫秸秆制画的方法。

sentences.english: The culms are used for making flutes and walling and are split for weaving.
sentences.chinese: 秆用于做具沟和壁并且是纺织分裂。

sentences.english: The culms are used for weaving and for making furniture and farm tools.
sentences.chinese: 秆用于纺织，和用于做家俱和农场工具。

sentences.english: The stalks are left to be ploughed into the earth for the next planting.
sentences.chinese: 作物的秆被留着以便犁入土中作下次播种的肥料。

definition: root and lower stem of certain plants/classifier for pieces and clumps
branches of a tree/fork of a tree
celery wormwood (Artemisia carvifolia)/to give off/to weed
new shoot growing from cut branch or stump
